title: How to Play Bully

steps.headline: Always obey the rules and respect other people.
steps.description: Don't get into fights in the game unless necessary

steps.headline: Attend all of your classes and pass them.
Do something nice to other people around you if you have the time.
Work on your objectives.
steps.description: This will get you further in the game and you either earn or respect that group of people.

steps.headline: Most importantly, stay out of trouble as much as possible!

text: Always obey the rules and respect other people. Don't get into fights in the game unless necessary Attend all of your classes and pass them.  Do something nice to other people around you if you have the time.  Work on your objectives. This will get you further in the game and you either earn or respect that group of people. Most importantly, stay out of trouble as much as possible!
